jobDescription: We are looking for a smart and creative engineer to join our team of experienced developers located in the Waltham headquarter office. As a part of our agile team, you will be working on a variety of cutting-edge technologies for a high volume SaaS platform that enables our customers to get real results through email newsletters, surveys, events, Facebook promotions, online listings, and more. Responsibilities Include:Independently work in a fast-paced environment. Learn new technologies. Keep abreast of industry trends.Collaborate with senior engineers to refactor and improve existing functionality, to build new functionality from scratch, to innovate new ideas, and to solve problemsParticipate in code reviews and retrospectives to help improve our agile development processSkills and Experience:Familiarity with a broad mix of technologies, including Java, JBoss, SQL (MySQL), Git and Linux.Curious about new technologies and ideas. Willingness to experiment and learn.Can-do positive attitude. High Energy.Start Date:Summer 2018
